body.p: Trigg County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Son of Robert C. Mayes and Agnes T. Locke Mayes. Married to Eliza B. Crump Mayes in Trigg County, Kentucky, on December 25, 1832. Married to Elizabeth Ann Caldwell Utterback Mayes in Calloway County, Kentucky, on January 3, 1842. Father of Emma C. Mayes, Robert Mayes, and Julia Mayes. Resident of Trigg County in 1840. Owned ten enslaved persons in Trigg County in 1840. Attorney in Trigg County in 1850. Owned twenty-five enslaved persons in Trigg County in 1850. Attorney in Trigg County in 1860. Owned twenty-four enslaved persons in Trigg County in 1860.
